name: Code42
description: This app integrates with Code42 to execute various investigate actions

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Add a departing employee to the departing employees detection list
actions.verbose: There is a short delay before you can query the updated results.

username.description: Username of the employee to add

departure_date.description: Date of departure for employee in format yyyy-MM-dd

actions.description: Remove a departing employee from the departing employees detection list
actions.verbose: There is a short delay before you can query the updated results.

username.description: Username of the employee to remove

actions.description: Returns a list of users who are on the departing employees list

filter_type.description: Filters the results based on specific filters

actions.description: Get a departing employee

username.description: The username of the departing employee to get

actions.description: Add a high risk employee to the high risk employees detection list

username.description: Username of the employee to add

actions.description: Remove a high risk employee from the high risk employees detection list

username.description: Username of the employee to remove

actions.description: Returns a list of users who are on the high-risk employees list

filter_type.description: Filters the results based on specific filters

actions.description: Get a high risk employee

username.description: The username of the high risk employee to get

actions.description: Add a risk tag to a user

username.description: Username of the employee to add a risk tag to

risk_tag.description: A risk tag to add to the user

actions.description: Remove a risk tag from a user

username.description: Username of the employee to remove a risk tag from

risk_tag.description: A risk tag to remove from the user

actions.description: Get alert details

alert_id.description: ID of the alert to retrieve

actions.description: Search Alerts
actions.verbose: Defaults to last 30 days if no date range is provided.

username.description: Username of the actor listed on alert

start_date.description: Beginning of date range to search. Time (in UTC) may also be supplied but is not required.

end_date.description: End of date range to search. Time (in UTC) may also be supplied but is not required.

actions.description: Set the state of the alert
Create a new Code42 user account
actions.verbose: There is a short delay before you will be able to add the new user to departing employee or high risk employee list.

org_uid.description: Org UID to create user in

password.verbose: Defaults to no password set, which leaves user in 'invited' state. They will need to reset password via email prior to first login.

actions.description: Blocks a user from accessing their Code42 account
actions.verbose: Blocks a user from accessing their Code42 account (endpoint backup/security processes continue while blocked).

actions.description: Deactivates user's Code42 account
Reactivates a deactivated user's Code42 account
Unblocks a user, allowing access to their Code42 account
Searches Code42 for a backed-up file with a matching hash and downloads it.

hash.description: The md5 or sha256 hash of the file to download.

filename.description: The name to give to the file after it is downloaded. If not supplied, the hash will be used.
